node.title: Choochoo
node.description: A progressive web application that gives you real-time updates of weather and train status at any MTA station in NYC.

node.title: Sudoku
node.description: My first progressive web app, a simple but featureful Sudoku game that uses a custom algorithm to generate infinite puzzles of varying difficulty.

node.title: NoahYamamoto.com
node.description: This very website! I coded this site from scratch using lots of modern features and techniques like HTML5 Canvas and templating engines.
